title: Gianluca95
author: Gianluca95
created_time: July 25, 2022, 12:52:52 PMLast edit: October 28, 2022, 05:19:32 PM by Gianluca95
content: Payouts5x Full Members - 25$/Week10x Sr. Members - 40$/Week 10x Hero/Legendary Members - 50$/WeekThe best 2 poster of week will receive an extra award of 25$ !Rules:Negative trust members are not allowed. Users that receive valid negative trust from DT2 or above while enrolled will be kicked and payment denied.Only constructive posts will be counted.Make a minimum number of 30 post each week in way to be elegible for paymentMaximum of 6 post/day will be counted. So, please, be active at least 5 days / week.Please do at least 10 post in Gambling section in way to be paidWe don't accept 1 day poster. Please, be constant with your posts, or you won't be paid.1 account per user. Any user found to have alts in the campaign will be kicked and denied payment.Posts in Games & rounds, Off topic, Micro earnings, investor based games, Meta, Politics and Society and other signature campaign thread will not be counted.No other signatures are allowed to be worn while you are in the campaign.Users found to spam will be banned from the campaign and payment will be denied.Posts will be counted and payments will be made on tuesday.Week will end on tuesday at the 11:00 AM (FORUM TIME), so, please, ensure that you've followed every requirement for that day.Notes:Payments will be directly processed by me, I have funds for 1 month of campaign at the moment.In the case of a rank up, a new slot will only be available if the total enrolled members does not exceed the maximum (25 users).Any rule changes / updates will be posted in the following post. it is your responsibility to check in case of any updates.Post quality will be the main priority in this campaign.Not reaching payout threshold for 2 weeks in a row will result in being kicked from the campaign and being banned from reapplying for 1 week.*I am only managing the campaign. I am not affiliated with this service. I just look at your posts.If you want to join, first wear the signature based on your rank, then fill this form with the following informations:QuoteName:Post count:Rank:BTC Segwit Address:Profile comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on July 25, 2022, 12:52:52 PMMake a minimum number of 30 post each week in way to be elegible for paymentAre you encouraging spamming? Or do you not care as long as you are paid by your employer? 30 posts per week is far too many. This would only attract a slew of scumbag spammers.

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: igehhh on July 25, 2022, 01:13:04 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on July 25, 2022, 12:52:52 PMMake a minimum number of 30 post each week in way to be elegible for paymentAre you encouraging spamming? Or do you not care as long as you are paid by your employer? 30 posts per week is far too many. This would only attract a slew of scumbag spammers.Absolutely no. I think that a good requirement for message to be written each week is between 25 and 35. 30 post/week is something like 4-5 post/day, and it doesn't seems spam, if you are active here on daily basis.There are also campaign that allow user to post 50-60 or 80 messages/week in way to let them earn as much as possible. Would you consider them as spam? No, if that is quality content.
